00011 // consistent
00012 #ifndef SAGA_SKIP_CONFIG_HPP

00016 // boost knows about windows.  Note that the other platform defines are defined
00017 // in saga-config.hpp
00018 #include <boost/config.hpp>
00019 #ifdef BOOST_WINDOWS
00020 # define SAGA_WINDOWS
00021 #endif
